symptom_form_subtitle: Your AI assistant for over-the-counter medication info.
symptoms_placeholder: e.g., 'I have a headache, runny nose, and a slight fever.'
disclaimer_text: SymptomAid provides information for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
no_suggestions_error: No medication suggestions could be generated for the provided symptoms. Please try rephrasing or providing more detail.
fetch_suggestions_error: Failed to get suggestions. Please try again later.
sign_in_prompt: Sign in to your SymptomAid account
